title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 367.15 - Violations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 367.15 - Violations

State Regulations
A violation of this Part is considered to be a public
nuisance. In addition, any person who violates any provision of this Part is
liable for a civil penalty of not more than $500 per violation. Each day that a
violation continues or exists is considered a separate violation. Any civil
penalty may only be assessed following a hearing or opportunity to be heard
pursuant to Part 622 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
367.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
